nvim-treesitter-context Lightweight alternative to context.vim Note: This plugin requires necessary language parsers in order to work. Non default language parsers can be installed with nvim-treesitter. Requirements Neovim >= v0.9.0 Note: if you need support for Neovim 0.6.x please use the tag .
